endemo2.input.input.FileReadingHelper¶

class FileReadingHelper(file_name, sheet_name, skip_rows, sheet_transform)[source]¶

Bases: object

A helper class to read products historical data. It provides some fixed transformation operations.

Variables:

  • file_name (str) – The files name, relative to the path variable.

  • sheet_name (str) – The name of the sheet that is to be read from the file.

  • skip_rows ([int]) – These rows(!) will be skipped when reading the dataframe. Done by numerical index.

  • sheet_transform (lambda[pd.Dataframe -> pd.Dataframe]) – A transformation operation on the dataframe

  • df (pd.Dataframe) – The current dataframe.

  • path (Path) – The path to the folder, where the file is. It can to be set after constructing the FileReadingHelper Object.

Methods

__init__

get

Getter for the dataframe.

set_path_and_read

Sets the path variable and reads the file with name self.file_name in the path folder.

skip_years

Filters the skip years from the current dataframe.
get()[source]¶

Getter for the dataframe.

Return type:

DataFrame

Returns:

The current dataframe, which is filtered depending on previous function calls on this class.

set_path_and_read(path)[source]¶

Sets the path variable and reads the file with name self.file_name in the path folder.

Parameters:

path (Path) – The path, where the file lies.

Return type:

None

skip_years(skip_years)[source]¶

Filters the skip years from the current dataframe.

Parameters:

skip_years – The list of years to skip.
